subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 26 points as the Knicks beat the Cavaliers and moved into a tie with Cleveland for 10th in the conference, three and a half games behind eighth-place Atlanta.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 26 points as the Knicks beat the Cavaliers and moved into a tie with Cleveland for 10th in the conference, three and a half games behind eighth-place Atlanta.
